TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlAttributeAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指定 必须将类成员序列化为 XML 属性。

span.span: Specifies that the must serialize the class member as an XML attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属于一系列属性，用于控制如何序列化或反序列化对象。The belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes, or deserializes, an object. 有关类似属性的完整列表，请参阅[Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md). 当应用于公共字段或属性，通知要序列化为 XML 特性的成员。When applied to a public field or property, the informs the to serialize the member as an XML attribute. 默认情况下，序列化公共字段和属性作为 XML 元素。By default, the serializes public fields and properties as XML elements. 可以分配仅为公共字段或返回值 （或值的数组） 的公共属性可以映射到一个 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 的简单类型 (包括所有的内置数据类型派生自 XSD `anySimpleType`类型)。You can assign the only to public fields or public properties that return a value (or array of values) that can be mapped to one of the XML Schema definition language (XSD) simple types (including all built-in datatypes derived from the XSD `anySimpleType` type). 可能的类型包括任何可以映射到 XSD 简单类型，包括， ，和枚举。The possible types include any that can be mapped to the XSD simple types, including , , and enumerations. 请参阅有关的 XSD 类型以及它们是列表的属性映射到.net 数据类型。See the property for a list of XSD types and how they are mapped to.NET data types. 有两个特殊属性，可以用来设置: `xml:lang` （指定语言） 和`xml:space`（指定如何处理空白区域） 的属性。There are two special attributes that can be set with the : the `xml:lang` (specifies language) and `xml:space` (specifies how to handle white space) attributes. 这些属性用于传达只与处理 XML 的应用程序相关的信息。These attributes are intended to convey information that is relevant only to an application processing the XML. 在下面的代码显示了这些设置的示例。Examples of setting these are shown in the following code. ```csharp [XmlAttribute("xml:lang")] public string Lang; // Set this to 'default' or 'preserve'. [XmlAttribute("space", Namespace = "http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace")] public string Space ``` ```vb _ Public Lang As String ' Set this to 'default' or 'preserve'. _ Public Space As String ``` 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 可以使用单词`XmlAttribute`而不是较长在代码中。You can use the word `XmlAttribute` in your code instead of the longer . ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类，其中包含多个字段到应用。The following example serializes a class that contains several fields to which the is applied. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 属性的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the XML attribute.
The name of the XML attribute.
The default is the member name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的 XML 属性名称时不能使用默认值。Use the property to specify an XML attribute name when the default value cannot be used. 例如，如果 XML 属性名称作为成员标识符无效，则可以使用标识符，而设置的有效名称为无效的名称。For example, if the XML attribute name is invalid as a member identifier, you can use a valid name for the identifier while setting the to an invalid name. ## Examples 下面的示例设置属性的。The following example sets the property of an . [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.AttributeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.AttributeName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.AttributeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.AttributeName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.AttributeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.AttributeName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 生成的 XML 属性的 XSD 数据类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the XSD data type of the XML attribute generated by the .

value.span: 一种 XSD（XML 架构文档）数据类型，由名为“XML Schema: DataTypes”（XML 架构：数据类型）的万维网联合会 (www.w3.org) 文档定义。

span.span: An XSD (XML Schema Document) data type, as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document named "XML Schema: DataTypes".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了 XSD 简单数据类型及其.net 等效项。The following table lists the XSD simple data types with their.NET equivalents. Xsd`base64Binary`并`hexBinary`数据类型使用的数组结构，并将应用与属性设置为"base64Binary"或"hexBinary"根据需要。For the XSD `base64Binary` and `hexBinary` data types, use an array of structures, and apply a with the property set to "base64Binary" or "hexBinary", as appropriate. Xsd`time`并`date`数据类型，使用键入并应用与设置为"日期"或"时间"。For the XSD `time` and `date` data types, use the type and apply the with the set to "date" or "time". 对于每个 XSD 类型映射到一个字符串，将应用于使用其属性设置为 XSD 类型。For every XSD type that is mapped to a string, apply the with its property set to the XSD type. 但是，这不会更改序列化格式，仅该成员的架构。However, this does not change the serialization format, only the schema for the member. > [!NOTE] > 属性是区分大小写，因此必须将其设置完全为 XSD 数据类型之一。The property is case-sensitive, so you must set it exactly to one of the XSD data types. > [!NOTE] > 将二进制数据作为 XML 元素是将其作为 XML 特性传递比效率更高。Passing binary data as an XML element is more efficient than passing it as an XML attribute. 有关 XML 数据类型的详细信息，请参阅名为"XML 架构 Part 2: Datatypes"World Wide Web 联合会 (www.w3.org) 文档。For more information about XML data types, see the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document named "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes". |XSD 数据类型XSD data type|.NET 数据类型.NET data type| |-------------------|--------------------| |anyURIanyURI|| |base64Binarybase64Binary|数组对象Array of objects| |booleanboolean|| |bytebyte|| |datedate|| |dateTimedateTime|| |decimaldecimal|| |doubledouble|| |ENTITYENTITY|| |实体ENTITIES|| |floatfloat|| |gDaygDay|| |gMonthgMonth|| |gMonthDaygMonthDay|| |gYeargYear|| |gYearMonthgYearMonth|| |HexBinaryhexBinary|数组对象Array of objects| |IdID|| |IDREFIDREF|| |IDREFSIDREFS|| |intint|| |整数integer|| |语言language|| |longlong|| |nameName|| |NCNameNCName|| |negativeIntegernegativeInteger|| |NMTOKENNMTOKEN|| |NMTOKENSNMTOKENS|| |normalizedStringnormalizedString|| |nonNegativeIntegernonNegativeInteger|| |nonPositiveIntegernonPositiveInteger|| |NOTATIONNOTATION|| |positiveIntegerpositiveInteger|| |QNameQName|| |持续时间duration|| |字符串string|| |shortshort|| |时间time|| |tokentoken|| |unsignedByteunsignedByte|| |unsignedIntunsignedInt|| |unsignedLongunsignedLong|| |unsignedShortunsignedShort|| ## Examples 下面的示例应用到两个成员，并设置属性设置为不同的值。The following example applies the to two members, and sets the property set to different values. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.DataType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.DataType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.DataType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.DataType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.DataType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.DataType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 生成的 XML 属性名称是否是限定的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the XML attribute name generated by the is qualified.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定的 XML 元素为限定或未限定。The property determines whether an XML element is qualified or unqualified. 属性是否符合 1999年http://www.w3.org规范`Namespaces in XML`。The property conforms to the 1999 http://www.w3.org specification `Namespaces in XML`. 如果属性设置为任何值，尝试设置属性设置为`XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`将引发异常。If the property is set to any value, attempting to set the property to `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified` throws an exception. 默认设置， `XmlSchemaForm.None`，指示检查 XML 文档以确定是否限定命名空间的架构。The default setting, `XmlSchemaForm.None`, instructs the to check the schema for the XML document to determine whether the namespace is qualified. 如果架构未指定的值的单个元素或属性，使用`elementFormDefault`和`attributeFormDefault`值，以确定是否限定的元素或属性。If the schema does not specify a value for an individual element or attribute, the uses the `elementFormDefault` and `attributeFormDefault` values to determine whether an element or attribute is qualified. 下面的 XML 代码显示了一个架构：The following XML code shows a schema: ```xml ``` 时读取的架构值都`Name`并`Number`是`XmlSchemaForm.None`，但`Name`限定的元素，而`Number`是非限定的元素。When the reads the schema, the value for both the `Name` and `Number` is `XmlSchemaForm.None`, but the `Name` element is qualified, while the `Number` element is unqualified. ## Examples 下面的示例应用到类中包含的两个字段。The following example applies the to two fields contained in a class. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Form Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Form Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Form Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 属性的 XML 命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML namespace of the XML attribute.

value.span: XML 属性的 XML 命名空间。

span.span: The XML namespace of the XML attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性符合http://www.w3.org规范`Namespaces in XML`。The property conforms to the http://www.w3.org specification `Namespaces in XML`. 若要创建与前缀关联的命名空间，必须创建对象，其中包含命名空间和 XML 文档中使用的前缀。To create namespaces that are associated with prefixes, you must create an object that contains the namespaces and prefixes used in the XML document. 为每个设置的命名空间必须与中的命名空间之一匹配对象。The namespace you set for each must match one of the namespaces in the object. 当生成 XML 代码，它正确加上前缀每个特性名称。When the generates the XML code, it correctly prefixes each attribute name. ## Examples 下面的示例应用到类中包含的两个字段。The following example applies the to two fields contained in a class. 该示例设置为每个属性的值不同于成员标识符的属性。The example sets the property for each attribute to a value different from the member identifier. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
